name: branch-in-window-title
description: Visual Studio Code extension that shows the current Git branch in the window title. This can be used to automate time allocation to issue tracking systems via WiseTime.

branchInWindowTitle.branchPollingInterva.description: Specifies the Git branch polling interval in milliseconds.

branchInWindowTitle.branchTemplate.description: Defines branch name appearance in window title. Use '$branchName' as placeholder.

branchInWindowTitle.branchNameIsPrefix.description: Prevent conflicts with time tracking software that thinks the application name always in window title after the last dash.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
